p: The results of this analysis show that human activities (i.e. meat production, economic growth, and HPD) at the county scale have also significantly affected grassland NPP changes. Estimations show that both GDP and HPD have had a negative influence on NPP, with coefficients of −0.093 ( P < 0.001) and −0.299 ( P < 0.001), respectively, while meat production (meat) has had a positive influence as the coefficient in this case is 0.146 ( P < 0.001).
